title: Adobe Is Suspending Accounts in Venezuela to Comply With a White House Order
text:
Adobe (ADBE) is cancelling all customer subscriptions for people living in Venezuela in order to comply with a Trump administration executive order restricting the ability of U.S. companies to do business with the troubled Latin American country.

“The U.S. Government issued Executive Order 13884, the practical effect of which is to prohibit almost all transactions and services between U.S. companies, entities, and individuals in Venezuela,” the company said on a webpage published today. “To remain compliant with this order,...
description: Adobe is cancelling all customer subscriptions for people living in Venezuela in order to comply with a Trump administration executive order restricting the ability of U.S. companies to do business with the troubled Latin American country.
